snippet.title: Solar Scion trailer
snippet.description: Your life as a captain is over! Or is it?.. Make peace with your past, or blow it up! Build, bargain and battle your way back to the land of the living in this top-down strategy shooter! Do you have what it takes to be a Solar Scion?         Wishlist on Steam!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1395510/Solar_Scion/
